sentences.en: After she learned of the accident, the girl began to shake like an aspen leaf.
sentences.cn: 当这位姑娘得悉那场意外事故时, 她浑身发抖.

sentences.en: Aspen pulp is the weakest of the commonly used hardwoods strong as spruce.
sentences.cn: 白杨是常用于生产亚硫酸盐浆强度较差的阔叶木,撕裂度和耐破度分别为云杉浆的50%和60%.

sentences.en: Connie: That's great, Maria. I'd like to go to Aspen too.
sentences.cn: 康妮: 太棒了, 玛丽亚. 我也想去奥斯本了.

sentences.en: Groves of elderly aspen tremble in the wind, but no sprouts push up in the understory .
sentences.cn: 年老的白杨树丛在风中颤动， 下层植被却没有新树苗生长。

sentences.en: I dudder and shake like an aspen leaf.
sentences.cn: 我发哆嗦和颤抖就像是一片摇晃的树叶.

sentences.en: I'm so tired but I to go snowboarding for a week with my friends in Aspen!
sentences.cn: 例如:“我真的累得不行了,哎,但我还得同我朋友们去阿斯彭滑雪玩一周! ”

sentences.en: It burns itself out instantly after the match is lit but generates enough heat to ignite the aspen shank.
sentences.cn: 在火柴点着之后，它就立即烧光了，但是产生的热量足以点燃山杨做的火柴棍。

sentences.en: Kennedy, was killed in a skiing accident on Aspen Mountain in Colorado.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪, 被杀害了在滑雪事故在亚斯本山在科罗拉多.

sentences.en: Maria: And I've driven through Denver. But I've never been to Aspen.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚: 我曾驾车驶过丹佛, 但我从未到过奥斯本.

sentences.en: Maria: Yes, but I'm seeing friends in Aspen.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚: 是的, 但我要在奥斯本会朋友.

sentences.en: On the hillside, aspen trees present a similar picture.
sentences.cn: 山坡上的白杨树也有类似的情况.

sentences.en: Production technologies of aspen and straw high yield pulps are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了杨木高得率浆和草类高得率浆的生产工艺技术.

sentences.en: Rich with aspen parkland and grasslands, marshes and small lakes, and spanning deciduous and boreal forests, Riding Mounting is a top wildlife-viewing locale.
sentences.cn: 这个公园有着大批山杨树的公园场地、草地、沼泽和小湖泊、落叶和寒带森林，骑马登山是一个顶级的观赏野生动物的活动。

sentences.en: Software Application of Aspen PIMS in Tianjin Branch Company.
The aspen and its golden leaves - this is the "signature tree" that most people think of on a Colorado fall colors tour.
sentences.cn: 山杨树和它的黄金色的树叶- 大多数人认为这些树是科罗拉多州秋天的彩色旅游的“信号树”。

sentences.en: The basic simulation and functions of ASPEN PLUS software are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了aspenPLUS软件的基本流程模拟和功能.

sentences.en: The main function and using of Aspen Plus are presumptively introduced.
sentences.cn: 概括介绍了这款软件的功能和使用方法.

sentences.en: The Ritz-Carlton in Aspen has to rank as one of the most extraordinary hotels I have ever been to.
sentences.cn: 不得不说，阿斯彭的丽兹·卡尔顿饭店是我所住过的最气派的酒店之一。

sentences.en: Those aspen leaves of theirs never leave wagging.
sentences.cn: 他们那不说话就难过的舌头从来不休息.

words.tran_cn: [林]山杨的；类似白杨的；颤抖的

trans.tran_cn: 山杨的；类似白杨的；颤抖的

trans.tran_en: a type of tree from western North America with leaves that shake a lot in the wind
